name: Babylon (Steve Moore)
description:
The Peeps go about their daily lives, constantly consuming and replenishing their Food, Water,  Rest and Social needs.

You own the Gold Mines and set the daily quota.   You also own the Billboards. 

Click on a Peep to follow them around.

Click on a Peep's need to see their preferences.

Peeps' beliefs, preferences and therefore choices can be influenced ...

[ Prototype ]
